text: I just did a push that has some JS attached to a button in the HTML and it uses the JS bridge to pop up a native Android Toast... so that works. I'm heading out for today but I'll be around and I'll see you on Sun eve!
Awesome and thank you <@U02F8TTPU>. See you Sunday.
I'll send any updates on travel via email. Otherwise, see you Sunday!
(side question: did you guys talk to evans about ramping up on Crosswalk knowledge?)
<@U030TQFR3> can we get gaston a device?

<@U030TQFR3> that's what Gaston and I have been doing this morning. Crosswalk WebView is integrated into the project and it works. I doubt we *need* crosswalk to do our thing, so if google won't accept it, we can fall back to the default chromium WebView.
<@U026PHQ3J>: What do we need? (and what's already available at uncorked?)
<@U030TQFR3> prefer N6 if possible and we have budget for it. our relevant internal devices are all tied to goldmember
<@U026PHQ3J> and I'd assume we'd need this before the trip? just one nexus 6?
I will bring my S3 on the trip in case it's too hard/expensive to get a N6 in a rush, or we need a backup device
<@U030TQFR3> if possible, yes, if not - not a showstopper
Cool. Any special needs for it -- or can I just go buy an unlocked one off the shelf? Assume we don't want a plan with it.
<!channel>: We won't have a Nexus 6 for this trip. But we've just put in the order and one will arrive next week.
